entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
